short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome Extension to copy the current page source code to the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stove Source is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed to make your lead generation tasks a breeze. With just a click of a button, this extension allows you to easily copy the current page source code to your clipboard.

Stove Source is a perfect companion for the Stove Leads platform, helping you streamline your lead generation process. Whether you're a freelancer, designer, marketer or SDR, Stove Source makes it easy to access and copy the code you need to generate amazing leads.

With its intuitive interface and seamless integration with Stove Leads, Stove Source is the perfect tool for anyone who wants to simplify their lead generation workflow. Download it today and see for yourself how easy it can be to get the job done!
